interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: UJM Magnetic Eyelashes 10 Pairs Reusable Magnetic Eyelash and Eyeliner Kit Natural Look False Lashes with Tweezers No Glue Needed Waterproof Magnetic Lashes
Review Date: 2020/11/22
Store: UJM
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'UJM', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '8 x 4 x 0.4 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Product Dimensions': '8 x 4 x 0.4 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'UJM-010'}
Review Text: This was my first time ever putting on fake lashes of any kind so any issues I had may have been operator error. I'm not the best at liquid eyeliner so some dripped in my eye which wasn't super fun. After the eyeliner dried the lashes stuck to it great! Fake eyelashes feel weird on but again I am new to it. They looked great though.
Review Title: Great quality lashes
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
ABOUT ME MediAnswer Collagen Firming Up Mask 4ea (1box) 25g - 77% Pure Collagen Extract Anti-Aging Total Care Facial Mask Sheet, Powerful Hydrating and Anti-Wrinkle Night Skin Care Samyang {'Brand': 'Samyang', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Anti-aging', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 6.3 x 0.9 inches; 0.88 Ounces'} Pros: I had noticeably firmer skin after one use. It was cold and relaxing.

Cons: The instructions on how to use are in Chinese. It's is a little difficult to position as the mask itself feels very much like slimy loose skin. My face turned red - but I do have very sensitive skin.

Overall I was happy with the tighter looking skin. You will definitely look like something out of a horror movie when you wear this face mask so don't wear it around small children (see picture). Works Mens Sea Facial Detox Facial Mask Sheet for Oily Skin- New Skincare - Blackhead, Pore Cleansing, Peel-off (Age under 35) SeptCity {'Brand': 'SeptCity', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Detoxifying', 'Skin Type': 'Oily', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '7.09 x 5.51 x 0.79 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '733424600616'} I was skeptical when I first opened the pouch for this mask and found a dry sheet that seemingly was just a paper towel with cut outs but when I followed the directions and soaked it in water for a minute it became thick and almost skin like. I suggest when you place it in water to soak it unfolded and flat if possible because I had just added water to the pouch and let it soak folded in that and it was difficult to unfold. The eye holes and mouth holes were a bit too small for me so I will likely cut the holes bigger before soaking next time. Overall it did hydrate my skin some but not to the point where I wouldn't need to use moisturizer as I still had some dry patches. I did not experience any redness from this and for the rest of the day my skin has felt tighter. I prefer the sheer masks that come pre mositened mostly because it saves me a step but it does do what it says it will do. Hydrates ok MainBasics Headband with Buttons for Face Masks (Gray) MainBasics {'Number of Items': '1', 'Brand': 'MainBasics', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9.5 x 3.5 x 0.3 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '790887351233'} It is a soft material headband and it is comfortable to wear. You do need to make sure the headband is flat against your head or your mask elastic will keep popping off the buttons though. It does give your ears a break if you have to wear a mask all day. I wish the buttons were more firmly sewn in place though. Works SUIBOBO skincare 100% quartz jade roller and Essential Oil bottle eye roller-real jade crystal gem stone marble cuarzo ice cold anti aging anti puff facial face roller eye roller massager SUIBOBO {'Package Dimensions': '7.13 x 3.66 x 1.46 inches; 7.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '619470980790', 'Manufacturer': 'HENNSERY CRAFT LIMITED'} Easy to use and comes packaged nicely - very giftable. This roller provides a nice massage for my face and has a cool feeling to it. I like to use it with my face moisturizer. The essential oil roller is a nice bonus. Relaxing LAPCOS 24K Gold Foil Hydrogel Eye Mask (1 Pack) Under Eye Patches for Dark Circles, Puffiness, Fine Lines & Wrinkles - Anti-Aging Korean Eye Patches to Firm & Smooth Under Eye Skin LAPCOS ["This\xa0luxurious hydrogel patch tackles the major signs of dark circles, puffiness, fine lines, and wrinkles for a glowing, revitalized appearance. Elevated by the power of Pure Gold to strengthen elastin, fight free radicals and stimulate blood flow achieving the ultimate level of radiance. Benefits: + Revitalizes and clarifies the under eye for a radiant glow + Helps to reverse the appearance of sun damage and age spots for an even complexion + Fights free radicals and protects against environmental aggressors Hero Ingredients Pure Gold An ingredient rumoured to be used in Cleopatra’s skincare routine, gold is revitalizing and clarifying. Known for its antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties, the precious metal strengthens elastin, fights free radicals and stimulates blood flow for a firm, even, and radiant complexion. Niacinamide A form of vitamin B3, this skin-restoring ingredient minimizes the appearance of pores, uneven skin tone and wrinkles while maximizing skin radiance and glow. Royal Jelly Extract This honey bee secretion filled with vitamins A, E, C and B and protective immune proteins, defends against free radicals and environmental stressors that cause premature cell aging, and is responsible for a young bee developing into a queen bee. Details Hero Ingredients: Pure Gold, Niacinamide and Royal Jelly Extract Ideal for these Concerns: dark circles, puffiness, fine lines and wrinkles Preferences: Cruelty-free,\xa0Sulfate-free Application Area: Under Eyes How to use: After cleansing, use toner to create a smooth skin base. Open package, remove supporter and place the mask on the outer corners to fit the eye shape. After 10-20 minutes, peel the mask off and lightly dab the remaining essence left on your skin. Full ingredient list Disclaimer: Ingredients are subject to change at the manufacturer's discretion. For the most complete and up-to-date list of ingredients, refer to the product packaging.) Disclaimer:Ingredients are subject to change at the manufacturer’s discretion. Actual packaging may vary, for the complete and up-to-date ingredients, refer to the product packaging. Please read labels, warnings and directions before use."] {'Package Dimensions': '5.12 x 3.94 x 0.24 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'A00FS153', 'UPC': '818929022900'} I only got a 1 pack so it may take a lot longer to see any results. I have used gold under eye masks before and this one wasn't as good. I like to put them in the refrigerator for a nice cooling effect when I wake up in morning and usually the cool feeling lasts 10 mins but with these after a minute it wasn't cool anymore. My eyes didnt look any brighter underneath after wearing for 20 mins. They do feel more moisturized so I gave 3 stars because of that. They are ok [Abib] Creme coating mask Tone-up solution 17g (5pcs) Abib {'Brand': 'Abib', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Number of Items': '5', 'Package Dimensions': '8.7 x 6.2 x 0.8 inches; 8.01 Ounces'} This mask looks pretty terrifying when on but it does a fantastic job of soothing the skin. My skin is very pale and gets sections of redness easily and when I woke up this morning I had no red sections and my skin was really hydrated. It did leave my skin a bit oily looking but I used an oil paper to pull that out and my skin looked great after that. Very soothing Reusable Cotton Swab Portable Silicone Swab Washable Cotton Swabs for Ear Cleaning Beauty Treatment Makeup Cotton Swab JAOYU {'Product Dimensions': '3.2 x 3.2 x 0.39 inches', 'UPC': '739232135913'} I love these silicone "cotton swabs"!! I personally have a problem with the feeling of cotton balls and cotton swabs but they are useful. I didn't even realize something like this existed so I was super excited to try it out. I used it for touching up makeup and they are really easy to use and clean. It comes with different textured heads too so it's very versatile. Love these Avajar Perfect V Lifting Premium Eye Mask 5 Sets(10 Pairs) - Under Eye Collagen Patch | Hydrogel Anti Aging Mask for Puffy Eyes & Bags, Dark Circles and Wrinkles | Elasticity Improvement Pad a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar {'Brand': 'a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar', 'Item Form': 'Mask', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Scent': 'Hydrogel', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Dimensions': '4.33 x 2.17 x 5.91 inches; 4.66 Ounces'} I was surprised when the instructions said to leave these on for 1 to 2 hours as I am used to other under eye patches only being on for 20 mins. I had the patches on for 1 hour and 25 mins. It had a slightly cool feeling the whole time it was on. I have sensitive skin and had no adverse reaction to it. I was impressed that my eye puffiness was visibly reduced. Reduced puffiness Panama Jack Sunscreen Lip Balm - SPF 45, Tropical & Mango 6 Pack Plus, Broad Spectrum UVA-UVB Sunscreen Protection, Prevents & Soothes Dry, Chapped Lips Panama Jack {'Scent': 'Mango', 'Product Benefits': 'Soothing', 'Item Weight': '4.25 Grams', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5.08 x 4.72 x 1.34 inches; 0.15 Ounces'} I have sensitive lips so I tend to only use nivea lip gloss but I wanted something with better sun protection. This one didn't cause my lips to get itchy or dry and goes on very smooth. There is hardly any scent to it and no flavor except for a slight sunscreen taste. Overall I like it because it provided great sun protection. Smooth EASYDEW Fill Up Volume Spot 0.67 fl oz -Anti-Aging Filler Spot Good for Topical Wrinkle Care with Hyaluronic Acid I Moisturizer with Instant Filling Effect and Skin Renewal | For Topical Area EASYDEW {'Brand': 'EASYDEW', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Active Ingredients': 'Hyaluronic acid', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '1.46 x 0.91 x 5.71 inches; 1.41 Ounces'} I've used for 3 days now and haven't noticed any difference. It might work after a longer period of use. That being said, I have sensitive skin and didn't have any bad reactions to this and a little bit does go a long way. Haven't noticed results UJM Magnetic Eyelashes 10 Pairs Reusable Magnetic Eyelash and Eyeliner Kit Natural Look False Lashes with Tweezers No Glue Needed Waterproof Magnetic Lashes UJM {'Brand': 'UJM', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '8 x 4 x 0.4 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Product Dimensions': '8 x 4 x 0.4 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'UJM-010'} This was my first time ever putting on fake lashes of any kind so any issues I had may have been operator error. I'm not the best at liquid eyeliner so some dripped in my eye which wasn't super fun. After the eyeliner dried the lashes stuck to it great! Fake eyelashes feel weird on but again I am new to it. They looked great though. Great quality lashes
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

The user maintains a strong interest in skincare, particularly in anti-aging products, hydration solutions, sun protection, and lip care, and has recently started exploring beauty accessories like false eyelashes. Their interactions show a cautious yet open approach to new products, especially those offering targeted benefits without irritating their sensitive skin. They favor soothing formulations with minimal scent, which aligns with their preference for enhancing their beauty regimen safely.

Hydration and skin-tightening effects are priorities, as are products with clear usage instructions. The user has shown interest in cruelty-free options and seeks functional accessories that improve comfort during skincare or beauty application rituals. Their experience with trial products indicates a willingness to monitor long-term effectiveness, highlighting their commitment to nurturing sensitive skin while exploring new makeup techniques.

While they appreciate sensory qualities such as texture and fragrance, they are mindful of potential irritants, preferring gentler formulations. Their new interest in false eyelashes reflects a desire to enhance their beauty routine while maintaining a focus on comfort and safety. Overall, they embrace functional enhancements and appreciate products that deliver visible results, ensuring they align with their skincare philosophy of prioritizing safety and addressing specific skin concerns.
